Beautifully crafted to reflect quality and style, this builder's own home sited on a generous 1000 square metre block (approximately), presents the perfect proposition for the first home buyer, retirees or savvy investor.

Description:
POSITION PERFECT! A HIDDEN GEM OFFERING SPACE, TRANQUILITY AND OPPORTUNITIES
This beautifully presented family home is set well back from the road on a large allotment in a tightly held area. Surrounded by established eucalypts and a stunning native garden, this charming and spacious property has been impeccably maintained. The property is within walking distance of Strath Village shopping centre, Kennington Reservoir, One Tree Hill Regional Park, La Trobe University, and primary and secondary schools.
The circular driveway leads to the front of the house where a shady verandah is a hidden behind the leafy garden. Off the entry is a large rumpus room with plenty of storage, to the other side is a formal dining room and sunken lounge ideal for entertaining. Exposed brick walls, large fireplace and timber-lined ceilings all provide extra appeal. An open plan kitchen, dining and living room in the centre of the home has benefited from a recent refurbishment with a modern kitchen featuring great storage and new appliances.
A hallway from the central living area leads down to a sizeable laundry with excellent storage; a family bathroom; separate toilet; and four bedrooms, all with built-in robes. The master bedroom offers generous proportions as well as a dressing room and ensuite.
Timber-framed glass sliding doors from all the main living areas open out to a paved terrace along the back of the home. The colourbond fence borders the property, providing security and privacy. The beautiful native garden is serviced by a fantastic outdoor garden shed, along with a fernery and water tanks.
Additional features include:
Ducted evaporative cooling and ducted gas heating
Solid fuel heating in main living area
Split system heating and cooling in main living area
Modern kitchen appliances including induction cooktop, oven and dishwasher
Solar panels (4kw)
Brand new gas hot water system
Water tanks x 5 (approx. 12,000 litres)
Extra height double carport
Additional external storage space
4.2m x 2.7m workshop
5m x 4m garden shed with concrete flooring, lights and power
Drip watering system
This lovely family home is ideally located in a quality area close to all amenities. Absolutely perfect for a family wanting space and a quiet outlook, whilst still being close to shops and schools. The additional space available on the allotment ensures there are a variety of ways to add value over time such as subdivision or additional building (STCA).

Description:
THE CHAPEL - LUXURY URBAN STYLE IN STUNNING HERITAGE CONVERSION
Part of the prestigious gated community of St Aidens Park Complex is this absolutely outstanding property. With incredible period details perfectly complemented by a high-end industrial, urban finish, the apartment once serving as a chapel offers the quality feel of a loft-style development in a major city. * Please find expected sale range in Statement of Information which can be found on this page. *
Unique features such as 15-foot pressed metal ceilings; elaborate decorative cornice, corbels and coving; and timber flooring, are complemented by modern fixtures and fittings. The Complex, originally built as an Orphanage in 1905 in a French Medieval Style, has enjoyed a recent revival with a limited number of unique apartments being developed and a shared space offering parking, inground swimming pool, common room, landscaped gardens and lift access.

The bathroom, positioned between the bedrooms, features large walk-in shower, wall-hung hand basin and WC.
Set in popular Kennington, close to Strath and Kennington Village shopping centres, La Trobe University, public transport and just a few minutes from the CBD.
This unique property has plenty to offer location, lifestyle, history and stunning city skyline views.
